game

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Class managing inputs

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.BitSet keyboardBitSet
      Bitset which registers if any KeyCode keeps being pressed or if it is released.
      private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> keyPressedEventHandler
      "Key Pressed" handler for all input events: register pressed key in the bitset
      private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> keyReleasedEventHandler
      "Key Released" handler for all input events: unregister released key in the bitset
      private javafx.scene.Scene scene

      • is

        private boolean is(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key)
        Parameters:
        key - key to be compared with the current input
        Returns:
        true if key is inputed, else false

      • isPause

        public boolean isPause()
        Returns:
        true if Space key is inputed, else false

      • isExit

        public boolean isExit()
        Returns:
        true if Escape key is inputed, else false

      • isLoad

        public boolean isLoad()
        Returns:
        true if P key is inputed, else false
